name: Introduction to Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of programming using Python. Covers variables, loops, functions, and basic data structures.

name: Data Structures & Algorithms
description: Study of fundamental data structures including arrays, linked lists, trees, and graphs. Algorithm analysis and design.

name: Database Systems
description: Relational database design, SQL, normalization, and modern database technologies.

name: Software Engineering
description: Software development lifecycle, agile methodologies, testing, and project management.
